item.title: Book of the Beast Unrisen
item.description: Notes Found on the body of the Mind Flayer the Four Toes killed on the roots of Yggdrasil Passages â€œAnd a great sign appeared in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, with the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.

item.title: Luckbringer
item.description: Notes Weapon forged in the Forge of Spells in the Star Metal Mine A light blade, not one of immense power like the hammer or spear, but one that brings immense luck to someone who wields it.

item.title: Pafina Lyre
item.description: Notes Magical lyre given by Elyssa Engwyn to Fraeyda Has ability to cast certain spells

item.title: Talon
item.description: Notes Sword wielded by Avor Wolfkiss when she went to kill the dragon Zaeygryn Found by the Four Toes during their investigation of the Mansion in Berufell Currently posessed by Bug Powerful dragon slaying magic

item.title: The Black Blade
item.description: Notes Originall the pact weapon of Belmont, until we killed him Taken as the pact weapon of Eir Has a connection to Ceratos

item.title: Volo's Guide to Monsters
item.description: Notes Book of Monsters purchased by the Four Toes in Ifyr #books
